narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Permanente Medical Group INC is a Internal Medicine provider based in Richmond, CA. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $37.8M in Medicaid payments across 1.6M claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $37.8M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
